sentences.sContent: Use blonde highlights to brighten your hair.
sentences.sCn: 用点金色的挑染，让你的发色明亮起来。

sentences.sContent: He brightened up at their words of encouragement.
sentences.sCn: 听到他们鼓励的话，他高兴起来。

synos.tran: 明亮；变亮；活跃；快乐高兴

words.tran: 明亮的，鲜明的；聪明的；愉快的
[光][天] 亮度；聪明，活泼；鲜艳；愉快

trans.tranOther: to become or make sth lighter or brighter in colour
